summary:
Well... you become beheaded.
Why? I dont know. But i made it.
descriptionHtml:
[center]FROM THE CREATOR OF
Toothless and Furry
*dafuq? never heard of it.*
xD

PRESENTS

Beheaded v1.0
=================================================================================================================================
DESCRIPTION

Well... you become beheaded.
Why? I dont know. But i made it.

This is a very old mod i made long time ago. Still funny as he*l tho. So, check it out.
Hope to see some screenshots. xD
Cant wait to see what different characters, races and outfits with a headless character screenshots i will get. (Hope i get some.)

Adds a equipable decapitated, headless and hairless wears.
Decapitated only equips on decapitaion slot so your head will still be visible and its gonna look like a throaght slit wound. (also cool)
By equipping headless, you will remove the head and be trully headless.
And hairless.... well, think of it as getting a clean head shaved look within a second.

Why i made Decapitation, Headless and Hairless into 3 different clothing pieces?
Because of Utility. What utility? I dont know yet, but when it comes, you will be glad its its own piece. xD
I can make Decapitaion remove head by default if needed. Will be optional download.

Not really a mesh guru so it doesnt exactly come with a world mesh but it uses an existing world mesh that might surprise you.
Just took that item cuz it looks cool. But its in case you drop any of those items by mistake, so they dont disappear in the world.
Its not for world placements. Just dont drop it on a big hill, gonna have a hard time getting it back. >:D
Yup, while testing, dropped it from the Throath of the World. D*mn, that thing can roll. xD

HOW TO GET IT
enter help in the console with the following items (look for them separate)
Decapitated
Headless
Hairless (Optional, You dont need it for the beheaded look.)

Use Player.AddItem

Why i didnt really wanted to add this in world. (model reasons, youll see)
And.
Because i didnt want to add a add item script for such a mod.
Unnecessary in my opinion. Add item command is enough.
=================================================================================================================================
REQUIREMENTS
Skyrim v1.9+ (duh)
=================================================================================================================================
RECOMMENDED INSTALL
Install with Mod Organizer <3

MANUAL INSTALL\UNINSTALL
Extract the content from the .rar archive and place the files in "Skyrim\Data" where the game is installed.
Example of default Skyrim installed location:
Windows x32
(C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data\
Windows x64
(C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data\
=================================================================================================================================
FILES AND FOLDERS

Decapitated v1.0 readme.txt
Decapitated.esp

Meshes\theimmersion\SHARED\
genericworldmodel
genericworldmodelf
=================================================================================================================================
DISCLAIMER
I am not responsible for any and all damages that arise from use of this mod.
Use at your own risk!

General Permission!
You can do with the mod itself what ever you want (modify, improve or simplify) for personal use only.
However, You cant include or claim as Your own any modified or unmodified files and commertialize or reupload them outside "Special Permisions!".

Special Permissions!
You may modify, include, reupload or otherwise use the following files and folders as You see fit.
(Do remember to rename them for your own mod to avoid conflicts.)
Plugin and Scripts. (Source scripts included for that purpouse.)

Special Permission apllies to the following files:

Its not like anything is made specially for this mod. It was just a duplicate and make playable.
Only had to pick world model for it.
So, you can do what ever you want.
Tho, rather than modify, include it and give me credit for the funny idea if you think its worth it. xD (NOT MANDATORY)
=================================================================================================================================
CHANGELOG

1.0
Made it a long long time ago.
Released it to the public.
=================================================================================================================================
CURRENT BUILD NOTES
Shiny!

FUTURE PLANS
Your welcome to post any idea feedback or even help me out with something if your up for it. (Requires lots of modding experiance and knowledge cuz i lack that.)
My next itterations will feature: (if ever and if possible)
Carry your head around when beheaded.
Head becomes a follower if dropped and your head walking around, following you, talking etc. Sometimes getting lost.
Or vice versa options. Randomlly.
=================================================================================================================================
MISCELLANEOUS

So i dont exactly know how "not safe for work" and what not is.
Cuz i consider adults only not just b*obs and a*s but gore like decapitations as well. So.
I will put it as adult only content and not safe for work,
unless someone can confirm to me that this mod does not fall under those categories so the mod gets a bit more exposure.
=================================================================================================================================
CREDITS
Original Author: theimmersion
Other Contributors: My coffee cup with a face and a big fat smile making my day, everyday. Rly, it even has a nose!
=================================================================================================================================[/center]
author: theimmersion
